channel.title: Health
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Health, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ways to Move for a Healthier Liver
item.description: When you have metabolic dysfunction-associated steatohepatitis (MASH), your liver is at risk of not being able to function. But you have the power to change that. One of the best steps you can take is being more active. Regular exercise can help you lose weight, reduce fat in your liver, and improve your general health. Thatâ€™s important when you also live with other conditions like diabetes, high cholesterol, and high blood pressure.
